title: How to Tackle Truth Decay
excerpt: The social contract of trust between experts and society is in danger of dissolving. We need to start putting it back together.

title: 51 Propaganda Techniques Explained in 11 Minutes: From Cognitive Dissonance
excerpt: The concept of propaganda has a great deal of power to fascinate. So does the very word propaganda, which to most of us today sounds faintly exotic, as if it referred mainly to phenomena from distant places and times.
